mapper.sql:
select u.user_id, u.username, u.name,u.password,u.salt,u.email,u.mobile,u.status,u.card_id,u.create_time, u.dept_id,u.comp_id,
nvl(c.name,'总公司') as comp_name, listagg(l.role_name, ',') within group( order by u.user_id) as role_name
ifnull(c.name,"总公司") as comp_name, GROUP_CONCAT(l.role_name) as role_name
from sys_user u left join sys_comp c on u.comp_id = c.comp_id left join sys_user_role r on u.user_id = r.user_id left join sys_role l on r.role_id = l.role_id

select user_id as "userId", username as "username", name as "name", password as "password", salt as "salt", email as "email", mobile as "mobile", status as "status", pwd_security_level as "pwdSecurityLevel", pwd_update_date as "pwdUpdateDate", comp_id as "compId", dept_id as "deptId", create_time as "createTime", card_id as "cardId", avatar as "avatar", update_time as "updateTime", update_by as "updateBy", create_by as "createBy", remark as "remark" from sys_user
select ur.name AS CompName from sys_user r left join sys_comp ur on ur.comp_id = r.comp_id

select u.user_id as userId, u.username, u.name,u.password,u.salt,u.email,u.mobile,u.status,u.card_id,u.create_time, u.dept_id,u.comp_id,
nvl(c.name,'总公司') as comp_name
ifnull(c.name,"总公司") as comp_name
from sys_user u left join sys_user_role r ON u.user_id = r.user_id left join sys_comp c on u.comp_id = c.comp_id
mapper.update: update sys_user set status = #{status} where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select u.user_id as userId, u.username, u.name,u.password,u.salt,u.email,u.mobile,u.status,u.card_id,u.create_time, u.dept_id,u.comp_id, nvl(c.name,'总公司') as comp_name ifnull(c.name,"总公司") as comp_name from sys_user u left join sys_comp c on u.comp_id = c.comp_id where u.user_id = #{userId} and u.del_flag = '0'
